snippet: As he works to make the Mets’ major league roster, catcher Landon Powell has been forthcoming about how the death of his 5-month-old daughter has affected his life.
abstract: New York Mets minor league catcher Landon Powell has had to reckon with death of his 5-month-old daughter as he contends for a starting spot.
lead_paragraph: As he works to make the Mets’ major league roster, catcher Landon Powell has been forthcoming about how the death of his 5-month-old daughter has affected his life.

headline.seo: Competing to Make Mets, Landon Powell Copes With Death of a Child
headline.main: Trying to Make the Majors, a Met Copes With the Death of a Child
headline.print_headline: Trying to Make the Majors, a Met Copes With the Death of a Child
